Name: 航天计划
About the game: Space science research theme strategy simulation game, click or drag the mouse to complete all operations. Completely different game focus, participate in and experience the research process of aerospace project from the perspective of researchers: recruit personnel, select topics and achieve the final task goal! Randomly generated characters Hire employees with different educational backgrounds, different personalities, different regions and different majors to enrich your personnel reserve! Dozens of scientific and technological topics Assign personnel to carry out topic research, and each successful topic can meet different task indicators! Combine research results Combine the research results of the topic, install the equipment into the spacecraft and achieve the mission goal - but note that the space in the spacecraft is limited! Random events The duration and funds are limited, but may unexpected events happen?
